gameDetails.name: Dominion: Governor Promo Card
gameDetails.description:
A Dominion promo card to celebrate the 10th anniversary of Puerto Rico.

Text:




    
        Governor (Action - Cost 5 [coin])

    
    
        +1 ActionChoose one; you get the version in parentheses: Each player gets +1 (+3) Cards; or each player gains a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card from his hand and gain a card costing exactly 1 [coin] (2 [coin]) more.

    


Part of the Dominion series.
